title: Cannabis Trade Show Testimony With Greg Marco
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Greg Marco is President of Leading Edge Expositions, which produces the CWCBExpo, a B2B trade show event for the legalized cannabis industry. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the regulatory challenges of putting on a cannabis conference and how the East Coast conferences vary from the mature markets on the West Coast. They also discuss the importance of branding, why packaging and labelling are huge, and what the next couple years may look like in the industry. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
